document.full_text: a new version of the $70 million broadway musical "spider-man: turn off the dark" with music written by u2's bono and the edge will open june 14, producers said on monday.
document.title: rejigged "spider-man" musical to re-open in june
lines_and_colors: a new version of the $70 million broadway musical "spider-man: turn off the dark" with music written by u2's bono and the edge will open june 14, producers said on monday.
